Package org.jboss.elemento.router

Class Link

java.lang.Object
org.jboss.elemento.HTMLContainerBuilder<HTMLAnchorElement>
org.jboss.elemento.router.Link
All Implemented Interfaces:
Container<HTMLAnchorElement,HTMLContainerBuilder<HTMLAnchorElement>>, Finder<HTMLAnchorElement>, HasElement<HTMLAnchorElement,HTMLContainerBuilder<HTMLAnchorElement>>, HasHTMLElement<HTMLAnchorElement,HTMLContainerBuilder<HTMLAnchorElement>>, IsElement<HTMLAnchorElement>, TypedBuilder<HTMLAnchorElement,HTMLContainerBuilder<HTMLAnchorElement>>
public class Link extends HTMLContainerBuilder<HTMLAnchorElement>
The Link class represents a hyperlink element that creates hyperlinks using the PlaceManager. It extends the HTMLContainerBuilder class, which is a builder for container-like HTML elements.

    • link

      public static Link link(PlaceManager placeManager, String route)
      Creates a new Link instance based on the given PlaceManager and route.
      Parameters:
      placeManager - The PlaceManager used to resolve the route.
      route - The route of the hyperlink.
      Returns:
      The new Link instance.
